item.description:
Fundraiser for the Boston Dyke March
Sponsored by Dyke Night

Saturday April 25
Chicks with Picks & Paintbrushes: An All Ages Evening of Live Music and Art
7.30 Doors, 8 pm- 10 pm Show


Enjoy a coffee house-type night out celebrating women in the arts and music. Event will feature art show including painter Sally Miller and live music by singer songwriters Jordan Clements, Mo Pepin and The Milling Gowns along with others.

So if you are looking for something a little different, join us for this all ages queer event.

Event will benefit the Boston Dyke March.

Details/E-list at www.dykenight.com

The Nave Gallery, Clarendon Hill Presbyterian Church, 155 Powderhouse Blvd., Somerville, MA, All Ages, $7

group.who: Friends of the Boston Dyke March
group.name: The Boston Dyke March

item.name: Live Music and Art Fundraiser for the Boston Dyke March Sponsored by Dyke Night
